name: 1password
description: Password manager with end-to-end encryption and cross-platform support for password generation and passkey support.

name: 1password-cli
description: Command-line tool for 1Password to eliminate plaintext secrets in code and automate tasks with biometric auth.

name: @clevercloud/random-labels
description: Tool that randomizes and displays labels in a suspenseful sequential manner with clipboard support.

name: baobab
description: GNOME disk usage analyzer scanning folders and devices presenting findings through tree and graphical views.

name: bat
description: A cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration displaying file contents with beautiful coloring.

name: brotli
description: General-purpose lossless compression combining LZ77 variant and Huffman coding with better ratios than alternatives.

name: bun
description: Fast all-in-one JavaScript toolkit combining runtime package manager bundler and test runner.
